name: Shuckle
description: The BERRIES it stores in its vase-like shell decompose and become a gooey liquid.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon is at full HP, any hit that would knock it out will instead leave it with 1 HP.  Regardless of its current HP, it is also immune to the one-hit KO moves: fissure, guillotine, horn drill, and sheer cold.  If this Pokémon is holding a focus sash, this ability takes precedence and the item will not be consumed.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.effect: This Pokémon eats any held Berry triggered by low HP when it falls below 50% of its HP, regardless of the Berry's usual threshold.
abilities.description: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.

abilities.name: Contrary
abilities.effect: Whenever this Pokémon's stats would be raised, they are instead lowered by the same amount, and vice versa.
abilities.description: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
